It is the perfect ending.', "Though the first eight episodes of this season aren't great, the final four episodes of the series give us everything we could ever want as fans. The Siege of Mandalore (Episodes 9-12) are the best Star Wars since The Empire Strikes Back and deserve the same recognition given to Episodes IV, V, Rogue One and The Mandalorian.", "This season is not perfect, due to one arc which is less than great. However, this season's final arc is the series' best, and some of the best Star Wars content ever made.", 'Even with the average "Bad Batch" episodes alongside the completely uncompelling Martez-Sister's episodes, the Siege of Mandalore episodes both close out the 12-year series in a phenomenally satisfying way and brought new interest into Star Wars even after Disney's many mistakes with the franchise.', 'Excelente término para esta serie, así se realiza una serie animada y un ejemplo de buen guión que algunas veces ni series de renombre poseen. Asoka como plato fuerte en esta serie es lo mejor de todo.', 'While previous seasons of Clone Wars had to cater for a very wide audience, writers and directors could abandon some of the usual commercial caveats in the last season and just tell a good story. And they did.', "This is an absolutely outstanding season, especially the final four episodes which are truly as great as any of the best Star Wars films. This season is packed with fun filled action, an amazing story line and an emotional and sentimental ending especially if you've been watching the show since the beginning. This is great Star Wars quality and will please any fan.", "Great ending to a great TV show but the Ashoka arc wasn't needed.", 'The last four episodes are the best Star Wars so far.', 'Im so so impressed with this', 'If I could, I would give this an 11/10. A captivating, heartbreaking, perfect finale to a show that played a great part of my childhood. This four episode finale is truly one of the best cinematic experiences that Star Wars has to offer. It may make your heart throb, but it is more than worth it, as simply put: this is Star Wars at its best.', 'Easily the best season. If only the whole season, or the whole show, had been as good as the last four episodes. The finale of the series was of cinematic quality.', "While the seasons third and final arc is some of the best Star Wars Content put out in the 21th century, the 7th season of Clone Wars starts out with a rather mediocre arc that never really exploitet it's full potential, followed by an arc that filled 4 episodes with a plot that needed 1, maybe two episodes, but it would already be stretching then and the plot still wouldn't be very good.", "Season 7's final 4 episodes is the best star wars movie in years and is on par and even better than some of the OG trilogy (ROTJ). It provides a more bitter than sweet conclusion to clone wars and will leave an impression on you long after you've watched it. But the season as a whole is not very solid. The final arc probably could have been released on it's own as a movie because these first eight episodes are pretty much a drag compared to the finale. The first arc is the Bad Batch which by all standard is an OK, arc 6.5/10 but its not really final season material(plus it's just setting up a spin off show so yeah). The second arc... is ironically some of the worst this show has to offer, while the story it's self isn't really that bad (more standard clone wars filler like the bad batch), the characters (specifically the 2 sisters) are so unlikable, cliche, annoying, and forgettable the only thing i can remember about them is that one is a bad pilot and the other is an idiot and i hate them both. It's also extremely disappointing since this is the first time we see Ashoka since season 5 and she comeback in this disappointing, drawn out, crap fest, that is barely entertaining and 100% SKIP ABLE LITERALLY YOU DON'T REALLY EVEN NEED TO WATCH IT FOR THE FINAL ARC OF THE SEASON. 2/10 the only thing i can say that is positive is a few of the jar jar episodes are worse, but just a few. In conclusion, what could have been the best star wars movie ever, is turned into a short season bogged down by filler and unnecessary garbage. I would have honestly given this 5/5 stars if those DUMB sister episodes didn't exist.", "Clone Wars was interesting. Apart from maybe 20 episodes in 7 seasons, all the rest is fun to watch. You learn a lot about the lore of Star Wars. It's a deeper look at the passage from the second movie to the order 66. Amazing work of animation, mix with character development. The rhythm of the episodes are frantic. I feel like the timeline and the movies are better justified with this series. I give it 82%. A must watch to know more about SW. Season 6 and 7 were the best.", 'the last 4 episodes are some of the best start wars anything i have seen.', 'No joke, the final season of the Clone Wars is one of the best entries in the Star Wars universe hands down- all thanks to brilliant characterization, awesome animation and  some truly jaw-dropping action sequences all making for the perfect conclusion to a fantastic series.', 'Amazing conclusion to an amazing series.', "This is the MOST heartbreaking season of any series I've ever seen. I cant stop crying when I get reminded of it... Its just so good and so sad!", 'One of the best seasons in the Clone Wars Series. With beautiful story telling, beautiful animation, with a breathtaking score, Season 7 leaves viewers satisfied while leaving them yearning for more.', "Even though there was a below average amount of episodes, they were above average in performance. The 4 episodes with the Martez sisters were some of the weakest episodes in a while, that out of the way, I can forgive those poor episodes because of the siege of Mandalore episodes (Last 4) were the best episodes of Star Wars the Clone Wars in the entire show. And the perfect conclusion to the show! Sorry G.O.T you've been beaten.", 'Clone Wars Season 7 was an amazing last season of this amazing show. The first arc about the Bad Batch were well done. While the next arc about Ahsoka and the sisters isn't as good but still adds some depth to Ahsoka. The final four episode arc "Siege of Mandalore" we see how Ahsoka and Rex dealt with Order 66 and serves as a perfect ending to the series.', "I've watched every show and movie, read every book and comic. EVERYTHING. and I have never come across a show that is as good as this one. It is by far as a kid the show that made me love star wars as much as I do. This last season is everything you could have ever wanted in a wrap up to this amazing godsend. Dave Filoni is the lord to all nerds I bow down to you.", "This is one of the best ways to end The Clone Wars, CGI is brilliant, from beginning to end of The Final Season it's crazy good.", 'One of the bests shows ever made.', 'After a throwaway clone-focused first arc, and a genuinely honest-but frustratingly slow-second one, the final arc alone is Clone Wars at its all-out peak, all with top-of-the-line animation, great direction, and an ultimately satisfying sense of scope!', 'The Bad Batch would deserve 4 or 3 1/2 stars. It was a fun welcome back but not final season material. The sisters arc was definitely not the best, 3 stars. But the siege of Mandalore is some of the best stuff ever PERIOD. Would give the siege of mandalore alone 66 stars out of 5.', 'The best "Star Wars" stories since many years! The final four episodes are really fantastic!! The proper remedy after the disaster of movie Part 8 and the ludicrous ending of Part 9.
So, it is now proven: "Star Wars" can easily have female protagonists to lead, when the story is good and relevant to all that has already happened to the "Star Wars's" universe and the character is fully developed. Every misstep of movies 7-9 has been avoided.
I was happy to reconnect with the franchise, hopeful that there will be a season 8 or at least a continuance of "Rebels".', 'Valió la pena la espera, con una animación mejorada y envidiable la temporada final hizo justicia a tan querida serie, con un final agridulce y un último capítulo bastante emotivo que incluso despierta nostalgia al devolvernos a la primera que vez que vimos la Venganza de los Sith. Bien logrado!! 👏', 'A brilliant last season for a beloved season. 

Season 7 gives us some of the most beautifully animated and heart wrenching scenes of the series, with a lot of fan-serving moments and a clear love for the franchise from its producers.', 'the sister arc is not really good the ending is great the animation awsome', 'I did not like this show when it have started many years ago. I hated Ahsoka Tano but as I watched the episodes and seasons I became a fan. The last 4 epsiode of this season is really extraordinary. This is absolut a different level what have seen from SW saga since the Disney had take over the LF.  I have to say Dave Filoni is genius at telling stories. And this is the most important. It dosent matter to have visually great a show or a movie (even a sci-fi) if the quality of the characters and depth of the story is lacking. He built up the best character (Ahsoka) in SW universe and bring back the hope that the Disney is able to produce decent quality of SW story.', "This is the caliber of Star Wars we've all been waiting for. I watched the first six seasons as a kid and was very disappointed when I found out that the series would be abruptly cut off because Disney bought Lucasfilm. Thankfully, Disney listened the the strong fan base and created this seventh season. 

Personally, I did not think that the first part of the episodes was very good. It was filled with the same corny Star Wars that was seen in the most recent trilogy. BUT, the last four episodes are absolutely spectacular. They weave perfectly into the cannon of Episode II and III without disrupting anything distastefully. I'm not usually one who is attracted to animation, but it was so well done that I caught myself admiring the work. This paired with an incredible score with a refreshed tone mimicking some of the themes in Episode III creates a deeply emotional experience (if you're a Star Wars junkie). 

Overall, the last four episodes are what make this season truly special. The other episodes set up the four part movie to be something truly awesome. I could not have asked for anything more. This is the Star Wars we have been waiting for.", 'I would give it 5 star because of the final 4 but the Bad Batch was ok and the Trace and Rafa episodes were frickin garbage', 'The depth of the characters is amazing. Slow in parts but that adds gravitas to the final episodes. Well played', "This is an absolutely incredible season. There are 3 story arcs in this season. The first one is about the Bad Batch, a group of clones that gained certain special abilities do to a genetic difference in their DNA. This arc is pretty good. The second arc is about Ahsoka and the Martez sisters. They get in some mishaps, and it goes into depth about how some people really feel about the Jedi. This arc is decent. The final arc is about the Siege of Mandalore and Order 66. My god, this arc is absolutely fantastic. It brings about so many emotions throughout it. It makes you feel happy, sad, nostalgic, amused, and depressed. The music used in the arc is absolutely fantastic, and is some of Kevin Kiner's best work. It ties in perfectly with the events of Revenge of the Sith, and by the end, it leaves you feeling depressed. The entire arc truly feels like a movie split into 4 parts. The Siege of Mandalore arc is what The Rise of Skywalker should've been: epic, full of passion, and emotional. I can talk about how good the arc is for days, rambling on and on. 
In conclusion, this is the REAL finale to content in the Skywalker Saga. I highly recommend watching this over any sequel content.", 'Some part of the season fills way too much information, but in the end this is show truly represents what star wars is all about, faith.', 'The best season of the show.', "This entire season was a masterpiece and Dave Filoni should be proud of it all. The ending was not as climactic as I wanted it to be but didn't leave much in the realm of loose ends.", "It was not that good, only the bad batch arc is worth watching. We all know how bad the sister arc was so I'll skip that. The last four episodes however were a huge disappointment to me. First off Ashoka acted like a little kid for awhile complaining how the Jedi won't give her troops even though she isn't a Jedi anymore and the Republic is under attack. I feel like the last 2 episodes could've been pushed together and that we can have an episode seeing how Rex and Ashoka deal with things after order 66. Also why is it that only Rex shows emotion, it's a very sad time and he is the only one who cares. It makes no sense that Ashoka wouldn't kill the clones at first because she doesn't even know that they aren't in control, hell even Rex is ready to shoot his own brothers but Ashoka tells him no. If Rex is okay with it then Ashoka should to. Spoiler Alert but I really loved how they made the storm troopers look as well as Darth Vader. Awesome, everything else was not that good though."]
Review_critics: ['The last three episodes are absolutely perfect, and show who were the true stars of this show. Magnificent ending. [Full review in Spanish]', "These last four episodes of Clone Wars is the best Star Wars movie I've seen in a while.", 'Season 7 was really all about the final story, and it was more than worth reviving the series for, and stands alongside the very best from the series and its sequel.', "While I will exhaust hours arguing Sequel Trilogy defenders, I'm sure all Star Wars fans will agree the Clone Wars finale is some of the best the entire saga has to offer.", "Some of the best Star Wars I've seen in years.", 'A mix of the excellent and the bloated; some the best stuff that Filoni has done for the series. [Full review in Spanish]', 'Sombre, thrilling and brilliantly done, The Final Season is a fine end to one of the best things about Star Wars.', "Every prequel should however, in the end, make the larger story better, and while Lucas' actual prequel trilogy struggled to do that, The Clone Wars pulled it off.", 'In the endgame, the show is better than ever.', 'This season will also serve as a gauge to see whether audiences want more of the STAR WARS saga told in animated form. If it comes even close to the quality of The Clone Wars, the answer will undoubtedly be yes.', 'The action sequences are dynamic, fluid, and the camerawork moves with a coolness and verve.', "'The Bad Batch' was a very welcome return for The Clone Wars. Its impressive visuals and balance of action and focus on the characters makes it feel as if the series had never left.", 'This first episode of an arc offers little more than some pulpy action, a slickly staged action sequence, and an enticing cliffhanger. "The Bad Batch" is not a spectacular comeback, all things considered, but it\'s good to be back in the world.', '"The Clone Wars" kicked off its last season with a war-filled episode that will certainly have fans talking... But the episode tells all "Star Wars" fans that it\'s time to unite one more time and get through the ongoing battle together.', "All the major names that returned to the Star Wars movies over the past half-decade were certainly exciting, and hearing animation stalwart Dee Bradley Baker's voice in new episodes of The Clone Wars is in many ways equally thrilling.", '[T]he standout aspect here is the much-improved animation, especially in the action department.', 'This is one of the biggest contributions that The Clone Wars brings to the Star Wars franchise. While the series rehabilitates the weaker parts in the Prequel trilogy, it breaks away from the light-vs.-dark dichotomy that defines the franchise.', 'The animation is better than ever, the spirit of the series-a more character-based version of the stories told between "Attack Of The Clones" and "Revenge Of The Sith" are as compelling as ever.', "It's the brief breath of air that keeps the audience invested in the fates of the soldiers on screen, building up their characters by showing who they are when they aren't fighting for their lives.", "I'm so happy to be writing these words: The Clone Wars is back baby, and it's good! But don't you think for a second that I didn't notice Anakin's longer hair, which is both beautiful and worrisome...", 'While I\'m not particularly sold on the Bad Batch being "truly" bad, or even all that complicated, they do provide an off-kilter dynamic that may lead to some interesting developments down the line.', "Only time will tell if this arc has enough meat to justify the four-episode structure, but it's off to a promising start.", '[The premiere] effectively reintroduces this narrative and demonstrates some of the reasons why fans find The Clone Wars so much fun in the first place.', "If you're already a fan of The Clone Wars, this initial return suggests a finale that fulfills the promise of everything that's come before. It's beautiful, action-packed, and rich in themes and emotion."]

title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
plot: Jedi Knights lead the Grand Army of the Republic against the droid army of the Separatists.
genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
writer: George Lucas
actors: Tom Kane, Dee Bradley Baker, Matt Lanter, James Arnold Taylor
Review_audience:
["The final arc of episodes is like one big animated star wars feature and is some of the most compelling Star Wars storytelling to ever exist, completely riveting and perfectly ties into Revenge of the Sith. The episodes before are good but not stand outs, that is the only reason this season doesn't get full marks but dam they truly ended this series on a huge high note.", 'Probably one of the best seasons in this series It certainly seems to have greatly improved in quality in the later seasons', 'Everything that Dave Filoni touches and have Sam Witwer and George Lucas inputs, story wise is a master piece. Simply an amazing season!! The perfect finale for a perfect show!', 'Best ending that it could  have.', 'The Clone Wars ends in a fantastic final season !', 'One of the best Star Wars content', "Early episode feel like a commercial for the Gi Joe (bad batch) toys. Time and time again druids will hold fire for no reason at all breaking the realism. Not to mention bad batch are all Gary Stu's with no limits. After that two cringy sister are introduced doesn't feel like cone wars until last episode were I imagine Disney mandates stopped.", "Clone Wars' final four episodes is the\xa0best Star Wars I've seen in a long time. Season 7 was mostly focused on the final tale, which was well worth resurrecting the series for, and which ranks among the greatest of the series.", "Star Wars: The Clone Wars's final season delivers absolutely nothing until the final four episodes, which, by then, is too late to save it.", "Good ending you really figure out wich were the original parts of the script and wich were Disney modifications. *Coughs* the  Martez'es

Would have given more stats but know that över havlf the season was scraped by Disney beacuse of lazyness is a damm pitty and left many arcs unfinished.. .", 'Never thought I would watch this show but it exceeded expectations immensely.', 'not giving all seasons a rating no', 'aside from the martinez arc this is star wars at its best', 'The final season of the clone wars is so awesome. All the seasons have good chemistry between charicters. This season gave me everything I wanted and redemed the show beyond what I thought', 'By far the best season of Star Wars the Clone Wars. Dave Filoni did a great job at wrapping up an amazing show. The final episodes successfully tied in the clone wars with the prequel films and cleared up questions that fans have had for many years. The animation upgrades were impressive and the fight scenes were portrayed flawlessly.', 'Me parece que este es el final ideal para esta serie. Combinando de muy buena manera esa aura triste del Episodio 3 con una atmosfera todavía alegre. Como si quisieras que esta temporada nunca acabara. Las escenas de acción son posiblemente las mejores de las series. Ya mucho mas pulidas, más dinámicas y con una mejora en la calidad notable. El Desarrollo de todos los personajes se cierra y no deja cabos sueltos. Si puede que algún episodio sea más una excusa para tapar algún hueco argumental de las películas, pero se agradece que hasta en esos pequeños detalles se esforzaran para darle un cierre digno a la serie. Una de las mejores temporadas, llena de acción y con esa magia de Star Wars que sigue igual de fresca que en aquel 1977.', 'Dave Filoni truly loves and understands Star Wars and made the best imperfect character in Ahsoka from being the most annoying and hated character to one of my favorite because she was humbled and became a humanized, relatable character. And also Rex, Maul, Clone Force 99, and everyone else is great too', 'A grand show with great stories that do lots of worldbuilding, as well as superb character development and chemistry.', 'Hands down the BEST Star Wars tale next to the movies and I will go a step further and say it surpasses most of the movies as well. The first half of the season is just ok but the later half is incredible!', "The perfect season finale in Television history! Star Wars the Clone Wars Season 7 deserves everything we can give it. Also, this season feels like Redemption for Star Wars' Reputation. Couldn't ask for anything better!!!", 'Season 7 is pretty great let me just start off by saying the last arc is literally the second best or the best arc in the show. The bad batch is pretty good but the one with ashoka and those girls is so bad. 
Last arc carries this season HARD', 'With heartbreaking moments, along with great action, impeccable and emotional storytelling. It makes this show have the perfect ending that it deserves.', 'As a whole, The Clone Wars is one of the most enjoyable TV shows you can find, it gets better every season and the characters are great.', "clone wars is my personal favorite star wars content. this season had its slow moments, i admit, but in hindsight only the good aspects are still present in my mind. the lengths i'd go to to be able to see this for the first time again…", 'Absolutely brilliant was to end the series.', 'I appreciate the fact that Disney made the effort to give this beloved show a proper ending Ahsoka vs Maul is one of the best lightsaber battles in star wars however they really missed the mark by not making the unfinished episodes from season 6 would have been much better than the martez sisters such wasted potential', 'The only bad thing about this season are the middle episodes with the twins. Otherwise it is literal perfection.', "Everything about the Clone Wars is masterful, and season 7 is the epitome of Filoni's work. It is beautiful and emotional, and it's the conclusion to this series that we didn't even know we needed. Absolute triumph.", 'The Siege of Mandalore was nothing short of a masterpiece. The best Star Wars content in 40 years.', 'I watched a good amount of the first 2 seasons of "Star Wars: The Clone Wars" as a kid on Cartoon Network. I never watched the series all the way through, so when Disney+ took on the final season of the series, I decided to undertake this journey. This is a show with many great story arcs and world-building moments and supplements both Episodes II and III well. I think for the most part it is easy to watch and keeps my interest. The series suffers from having at least one bad story arc in every season, which keeps it from true greatness. I think there are plenty of good and even great episodes scattered throughout the series, but the bad ones can make it a chore to watch at times if you decide to watch the entire series like myself. Overall, it is a solid addition to the "Star Wars" universe and one that fans will find plenty of enjoyment in despite some flawed story arcs.', 'The perfect finale for a legendary series.', "I have enjoyed The Clone Wars throughout its run, but Season Seven just manages to pull on the heart strings in a way that I never thought an animated show ever could.  We are gently eased into the season with a look at the Bad Batch (another show in the Star Wars saga well worth a watch), followed by a catchup with Ahsoka following her departure from the Jedi and then an amazing, motion-picture worth four episode arc that follows the events of Order 66 from Ahsoka and Rex's point of view.  Although technically a kids show, I feel that Season Seven has grown up with the fans that started with the show in 2008, culminating in some of the best story writing across the whole Star Wars saga.", 'Wonderful show overall. Very powerful ending, but very weak middle arc.', 'You cannot judge full season only because of amazing final. Martez episodes are wasted potential to show something more interesting.', 'O encerramento perfeito para a melhor série de Star Wars. O cerco de Mandalore é o melhor arco da franquia e eu me encontrei torcendo o tempo inteiro para de algum jeito Ahsoka impedir a Ordem 66. A luta dela com Maul é a melhor das animações e os gráficos e cenas tem a qualidade de um filme. Maul está poderosíssimo e a cena dele no corredor é de tirar o fôlego. Torço que Vossa Santidade Dave Filoni lance os 40 episódios cancelados de The Clone Wars posteriormente.', 'Totally fantastic has more life and depth than the Disney trilogy.', 'A spectacular ending to a spectacular show', 'Incredible storytelling and beautiful animation', "This would be 5 stars but I had to sit through those AWFUL episodes with the Hispanic sisters (I'm hispanic), telling their truth... But the Bad Batch ones and the Darth Maul ones... CHEF'S KISS!!!! NEVER HAVE I LOVED PADAWAN TANO so much!!!! That's how you write strong female characters. WHO SHOW and not TELL you why they are bad a*s.", 'Episodes 5-8 were awful. Pumped when they were finally over. And Wrecker in the bad batch is so annoying and idiotic that he completely ruins the other great aspects of the squad for me. Other than that this season was sick! The final 4 episodes were absolutely incredible.', 'Blending beautifully animated battle sequences with heartbreaking drama. The final season of Clone Wars concludes the popular series on highly satisfying and poignant note', "Dave Filoni has come back at it again, and revived Clone Wars! I finally finished watching Season 7 (the FINAL season) and the last 4 episodes were the BEST of the FINAL SEASON. The only arc that was boring was the Martez Sister Arc, which made me fall asleep for the 4 episodes. I didn't have a problem seeing Ahsoka Tano again (thank you Dave Filoni reminding us she's alive in Clone Wars and well), but the arc wasn't a great arc.

The final 4 episodes of ''Siege of Mandalore'' was OUTSTANDING either way. The music, the characters (Bad Batch was AMAZING), and the cinematography was OUTSTANDING. 

Thank you Dave Filoni for finishing off Clone Wars the RIGHT WAY with this season.", "The Bad Batch arc was basic, the Martinez or whatever sisters were annoying and infuriating, and the last arc couldn't make up for it IMO.", "Season 7 offers some of the best Star Wars television ever put to the small screen. It completes the stories of our clone trooper favorites, and ties in to Revenge of the Sith perfectly. I was a little thrown off by how it doesn't show the conclusion of Anakin/Obi-wan's story, or what happens to the jedi order. Instead it focuses on the events of Order 66 from Ahsoka's perspective. Looking back now I realize it wouldn't have made sense to show the fall of Windu, the Jedi order, Anakin/Obi-wan's friendship- because we've already seen all these events. We know these events are happening off screen but it keeps the conclusion of this story smaller scale, and more emotional. Seeing the failure of the Jedi, the fall of Anakin after his loss of Ahsoka, and the brainwashing of the Clones is genuinely moving, adding more layers of storytelling and emotional stakes underneath Episode 3.", 'Season 7, the final season of Star Wars: The Clone Wars is the perfect ending to this show, the last four episodes of the show is some of the best Star Wars out there. The animation is better than ever, the show looks more cinematic than ever before and the story is amazing. The first four episodes are amazing, the next four are honestly really bad but the saving grace of this season is easily the last four episodes. Well done Dave Filoni, you knocked it out of the park with this show!', 'Only down fall was the 3 episodes in the middle felt detached from the main story line.  The core story was well put together and tide in with the movies.', "Truth be told, I hated the first arc introduced, but I loved the last one. It's a deeper look into the tragic events shown in RoTS (2005). The animation is beautiful, but for the most part S7 is just too boring to hold up completely.", 'Masterpice, sad and bautifull like a poem...', 'love every minutes of it! I grew up with the Clone Wars, and this Season 7 completed my childhood :)', 'This. This is what Star Wars is at its best.', "Excellent conclusion to the world-within-a-world built over the past seasons by Filoni. Every Star Wars fan deserves to experience the masterclass in character development Filoni has carefully executed that raises the stakes of Anakin and Obi-Wan's journey. Filoni is a genius.

Separately, Ahsoka Tano could live on as one of the most beloved protagonists in this universe. The depth and arc of her character trajectory is incredible considering her portrayal has been limited to an animated medium. Not only does she provide meaningful representation for the female Star Wars fans, her flawed yet principled and compassionate nature are characteristics that fans of every stripes can admire and stand behind. Looking forward to seeing more of her in future Star Wars properties.", 'The final four episodes were amongst the best in the entire series, debatably the very best. Really makes you wish there were more seasons coming. The ending was as fulfilling as anyone could have hoped for, and it closed off a great series with a perfect blend of action, suspense, and emotion. Dave Filoni should continue to play a big role in the future of Star Wars.', "Execute Order S7. This final season not only finishes of the great Clone Wars series in an amazing finale, but also manages to tie the series into the Revenge of the Sith, the second best movie for a lot of people, including me. I haven't watched it yet, but I hope to and wish others will as well.", 'Yes. The series got better with each season, and the jumps in quality between the final few seasons were substantial. Ties in elegantly with the final movie of the prequel trilogy. I salute Dave Filoni.', "It was very good I wouldve given it 5 stars if it wasn't for the arc with the sisters that was bad. The bad batch arc was good but it was just normal clone wars to me but those last 4 episodes are the best episodes of the clone wars as a whole they were 11/10 episodes", 'Phenomenal score, heart wrenching story, a captivating final chapter in the Clone Wars series. One of the best stories told in a long time.', "Best star wars i've seen in a LOONG time", 'The first arc is pretty good and the second is alright. But the final four episodes of this series is some of the best Star Wars content I have ever seen and they EASILY make up for the flaws of the first two arcs.', 'I love this show and this is one of the best seasons!', 'Asi como alguien que quiere empezar a ver star wars tiene que ver las primeras 6 peliculas, tambien tendra que ver esta serie, es absolutamente fantastica, fue mejorando su calidad en todo sentido con el pasar de los años, la temporada 7 tiene un cierre magnifico, son muy buenas noticias que despues del fiasco que fueron las 3 peliculas de la secuela, hayan levantado el nivel con el final de esta serie y la serie de The Mandalorian, ojala que sigan por este camino por mucho tiempo.', 'The Clone Wars Season 7 is not only the best Season of Clone Wars, It has some of the best Star Wars of all time. The animation is incredible, The storytelling is Fantastic especially in the last glorious episodes. It is the perfect ending.', "Though the first eight episodes of this season aren't great, the final four episodes of the series give us everything we could ever want as fans. The Siege of Mandalore (Episodes 9-12) are the best Star Wars since The Empire Strikes Back and deserve the same recognition given to Episodes IV, V, Rogue One and The Mandalorian.", "This season is not perfect, due to one arc which is less than great. However, this season's final arc is the series' best, and some of the best Star Wars content ever made.", 'Even with the average "Bad Batch" episodes alongside the completely uncompelling Martez-Sister's episodes, the Siege of Mandalore episodes both close out the 12-year series in a phenomenally satisfying way and brought new interest into Star Wars even after Disney's many mistakes with the franchise.', 'Excelente término para esta serie, así se realiza una serie animada y un ejemplo de buen guión que algunas veces ni series de renombre poseen. Asoka como plato fuerte en esta serie es lo mejor de todo.', 'While previous seasons of Clone Wars had to cater for a very wide audience, writers and directors could abandon some of the usual commercial caveats in the last season and just tell a good story. And they did.', "This is an absolutely outstanding season, especially the final four episodes which are truly as great as any of the best Star Wars films. This season is packed with fun filled action, an amazing story line and an emotional and sentimental ending especially if you've been watching the show since the beginning. This is great Star Wars quality and will please any fan.", "Great ending to a great TV show but the Ashoka arc wasn't needed.", 'The last four episodes are the best Star Wars so far.', 'Im so so impressed with this', 'If I could, I would give this an 11/10. A captivating, heartbreaking, perfect finale to a show that played a great part of my childhood. This four episode finale is truly one of the best cinematic experiences that Star Wars has to offer. It may make your heart throb, but it is more than worth it, as simply put: this is Star Wars at its best.', 'Easily the best season. If only the whole season, or the whole show, had been as good as the last four episodes. The finale of the series was of cinematic quality.', "While the seasons third and final arc is some of the best Star Wars Content put out in the 21th century, the 7th season of Clone Wars starts out with a rather mediocre arc that never really exploitet it's full potential, followed by an arc that filled 4 episodes with a plot that needed 1, maybe two episodes, but it would already be stretching then and the plot still wouldn't be very good.", "Season 7's final 4 episodes is the best star wars movie in years and is on par and even better than some of the OG trilogy (ROTJ). It provides a more bitter than sweet conclusion to clone wars and will leave an impression on you long after you've watched it. But the season as a whole is not very solid. The final arc probably could have been released on it's own as a movie because these first eight episodes are pretty much a drag compared to the finale. The first arc is the Bad Batch which by all standard is an OK, arc 6.5/10 but its not really final season material(plus it's just setting up a spin off show so yeah). The second arc... is ironically some of the worst this show has to offer, while the story it's self isn't really that bad (more standard clone wars filler like the bad batch), the characters (specifically the 2 sisters) are so unlikable, cliche, annoying, and forgettable the only thing i can remember about them is that one is a bad pilot and the other is an idiot and i hate them both. It's also extremely disappointing since this is the first time we see Ashoka since season 5 and she comeback in this disappointing, drawn out, crap fest, that is barely entertaining and 100% SKIP ABLE LITERALLY YOU DON'T REALLY EVEN NEED TO WATCH IT FOR THE FINAL ARC OF THE SEASON. 2/10 the only thing i can say that is positive is a few of the jar jar episodes are worse, but just a few. In conclusion, what could have been the best star wars movie ever, is turned into a short season bogged down by filler and unnecessary garbage. I would have honestly given this 5/5 stars if those DUMB sister episodes didn't exist.", "Clone Wars was interesting. Apart from maybe 20 episodes in 7 seasons, all the rest is fun to watch. You learn a lot about the lore of Star Wars. It's a deeper look at the passage from the second movie to the order 66. Amazing work of animation, mix with character development. The rhythm of the episodes are frantic. I feel like the timeline and the movies are better justified with this series. I give it 82%. A must watch to know more about SW. Season 6 and 7 were the best.", 'the last 4 episodes are some of the best start wars anything i have seen.', 'No joke, the final season of the Clone Wars is one of the best entries in the Star Wars universe hands down- all thanks to brilliant characterization, awesome animation and  some truly jaw-dropping action sequences all making for the perfect conclusion to a fantastic series.', 'Amazing conclusion to an amazing series.', "This is the MOST heartbreaking season of any series I've ever seen. I cant stop crying when I get reminded of it... Its just so good and so sad!", 'One of the best seasons in the Clone Wars Series. With beautiful story telling, beautiful animation, with a breathtaking score, Season 7 leaves viewers satisfied while leaving them yearning for more.', "Even though there was a below average amount of episodes, they were above average in performance. The 4 episodes with the Martez sisters were some of the weakest episodes in a while, that out of the way, I can forgive those poor episodes because of the siege of Mandalore episodes (Last 4) were the best episodes of Star Wars the Clone Wars in the entire show. And the perfect conclusion to the show! Sorry G.O.T you've been beaten.", 'Clone Wars Season 7 was an amazing last season of this amazing show. The first arc about the Bad Batch were well done. While the next arc about Ahsoka and the sisters isn't as good but still adds some depth to Ahsoka. The final four episode arc "Siege of Mandalore" we see how Ahsoka and Rex dealt with Order 66 and serves as a perfect ending to the series.', "I've watched every show and movie, read every book and comic. EVERYTHING. and I have never come across a show that is as good as this one. It is by far as a kid the show that made me love star wars as much as I do. This last season is everything you could have ever wanted in a wrap up to this amazing godsend. Dave Filoni is the lord to all nerds I bow down to you.", "This is one of the best ways to end The Clone Wars, CGI is brilliant, from beginning to end of The Final Season it's crazy good.", 'One of the bests shows ever made.', 'After a throwaway clone-focused first arc, and a genuinely honest-but frustratingly slow-second one, the final arc alone is Clone Wars at its all-out peak, all with top-of-the-line animation, great direction, and an ultimately satisfying sense of scope!', 'The Bad Batch would deserve 4 or 3 1/2 stars. It was a fun welcome back but not final season material. The sisters arc was definitely not the best, 3 stars. But the siege of Mandalore is some of the best stuff ever PERIOD. Would give the siege of mandalore alone 66 stars out of 5.', 'The best "Star Wars" stories since many years! The final four episodes are really fantastic!! The proper remedy after the disaster of movie Part 8 and the ludicrous ending of Part 9.
So, it is now proven: "Star Wars" can easily have female protagonists to lead, when the story is good and relevant to all that has already happened to the "Star Wars's" universe and the character is fully developed. Every misstep of movies 7-9 has been avoided.
I was happy to reconnect with the franchise, hopeful that there will be a season 8 or at least a continuance of "Rebels".', 'Valió la pena la espera, con una animación mejorada y envidiable la temporada final hizo justicia a tan querida serie, con un final agridulce y un último capítulo bastante emotivo que incluso despierta nostalgia al devolvernos a la primera que vez que vimos la Venganza de los Sith. Bien logrado!! 👏', 'A brilliant last season for a beloved season. 

Season 7 gives us some of the most beautifully animated and heart wrenching scenes of the series, with a lot of fan-serving moments and a clear love for the franchise from its producers.', 'the sister arc is not really good the ending is great the animation awsome', 'I did not like this show when it have started many years ago. I hated Ahsoka Tano but as I watched the episodes and seasons I became a fan. The last 4 epsiode of this season is really extraordinary. This is absolut a different level what have seen from SW saga since the Disney had take over the LF.  I have to say Dave Filoni is genius at telling stories. And this is the most important. It dosent matter to have visually great a show or a movie (even a sci-fi) if the quality of the characters and depth of the story is lacking. He built up the best character (Ahsoka) in SW universe and bring back the hope that the Disney is able to produce decent quality of SW story.', "This is the caliber of Star Wars we've all been waiting for. I watched the first six seasons as a kid and was very disappointed when I found out that the series would be abruptly cut off because Disney bought Lucasfilm. Thankfully, Disney listened the the strong fan base and created this seventh season. 

Personally, I did not think that the first part of the episodes was very good. It was filled with the same corny Star Wars that was seen in the most recent trilogy. BUT, the last four episodes are absolutely spectacular. They weave perfectly into the cannon of Episode II and III without disrupting anything distastefully. I'm not usually one who is attracted to animation, but it was so well done that I caught myself admiring the work. This paired with an incredible score with a refreshed tone mimicking some of the themes in Episode III creates a deeply emotional experience (if you're a Star Wars junkie). 

Overall, the last four episodes are what make this season truly special. The other episodes set up the four part movie to be something truly awesome. I could not have asked for anything more. This is the Star Wars we have been waiting for.", 'I would give it 5 star because of the final 4 but the Bad Batch was ok and the Trace and Rafa episodes were frickin garbage', 'The depth of the characters is amazing. Slow in parts but that adds gravitas to the final episodes. Well played', "This is an absolutely incredible season. There are 3 story arcs in this season. The first one is about the Bad Batch, a group of clones that gained certain special abilities do to a genetic difference in their DNA. This arc is pretty good. The second arc is about Ahsoka and the Martez sisters. They get in some mishaps, and it goes into depth about how some people really feel about the Jedi. This arc is decent. The final arc is about the Siege of Mandalore and Order 66. My god, this arc is absolutely fantastic. It brings about so many emotions throughout it. It makes you feel happy, sad, nostalgic, amused, and depressed. The music used in the arc is absolutely fantastic, and is some of Kevin Kiner's best work. It ties in perfectly with the events of Revenge of the Sith, and by the end, it leaves you feeling depressed. The entire arc truly feels like a movie split into 4 parts. The Siege of Mandalore arc is what The Rise of Skywalker should've been: epic, full of passion, and emotional. I can talk about how good the arc is for days, rambling on and on. 
In conclusion, this is the REAL finale to content in the Skywalker Saga. I highly recommend watching this over any sequel content.", 'Some part of the season fills way too much information, but in the end this is show truly represents what star wars is all about, faith.', 'The best season of the show.', "This entire season was a masterpiece and Dave Filoni should be proud of it all. The ending was not as climactic as I wanted it to be but didn't leave much in the realm of loose ends.", "It was not that good, only the bad batch arc is worth watching. We all know how bad the sister arc was so I'll skip that. The last four episodes however were a huge disappointment to me. First off Ashoka acted like a little kid for awhile complaining how the Jedi won't give her troops even though she isn't a Jedi anymore and the Republic is under attack. I feel like the last 2 episodes could've been pushed together and that we can have an episode seeing how Rex and Ashoka deal with things after order 66. Also why is it that only Rex shows emotion, it's a very sad time and he is the only one who cares. It makes no sense that Ashoka wouldn't kill the clones at first because she doesn't even know that they aren't in control, hell even Rex is ready to shoot his own brothers but Ashoka tells him no. If Rex is okay with it then Ashoka should to. Spoiler Alert but I really loved how they made the storm troopers look as well as Darth Vader. Awesome, everything else was not that good though."]
Review_critics: ['The last three episodes are absolutely perfect, and show who were the true stars of this show. Magnificent ending. [Full review in Spanish]', "These last four episodes of Clone Wars is the best Star Wars movie I've seen in a while.", 'Season 7 was really all about the final story, and it was more than worth reviving the series for, and stands alongside the very best from the series and its sequel.', "While I will exhaust hours arguing Sequel Trilogy defenders, I'm sure all Star Wars fans will agree the Clone Wars finale is some of the best the entire saga has to offer.", "Some of the best Star Wars I've seen in years.", 'A mix of the excellent and the bloated; some the best stuff that Filoni has done for the series. [Full review in Spanish]', 'Sombre, thrilling and brilliantly done, The Final Season is a fine end to one of the best things about Star Wars.', "Every prequel should however, in the end, make the larger story better, and while Lucas' actual prequel trilogy struggled to do that, The Clone Wars pulled it off.", 'In the endgame, the show is better than ever.', 'This season will also serve as a gauge to see whether audiences want more of the STAR WARS saga told in animated form. If it comes even close to the quality of The Clone Wars, the answer will undoubtedly be yes.', 'The action sequences are dynamic, fluid, and the camerawork moves with a coolness and verve.', "'The Bad Batch' was a very welcome return for The Clone Wars. Its impressive visuals and balance of action and focus on the characters makes it feel as if the series had never left.", 'This first episode of an arc offers little more than some pulpy action, a slickly staged action sequence, and an enticing cliffhanger. "The Bad Batch" is not a spectacular comeback, all things considered, but it\'s good to be back in the world.', '"The Clone Wars" kicked off its last season with a war-filled episode that will certainly have fans talking... But the episode tells all "Star Wars" fans that it\'s time to unite one more time and get through the ongoing battle together.', "All the major names that returned to the Star Wars movies over the past half-decade were certainly exciting, and hearing animation stalwart Dee Bradley Baker's voice in new episodes of The Clone Wars is in many ways equally thrilling.", '[T]he standout aspect here is the much-improved animation, especially in the action department.', 'This is one of the biggest contributions that The Clone Wars brings to the Star Wars franchise. While the series rehabilitates the weaker parts in the Prequel trilogy, it breaks away from the light-vs.-dark dichotomy that defines the franchise.', 'The animation is better than ever, the spirit of the series-a more character-based version of the stories told between "Attack Of The Clones" and "Revenge Of The Sith" are as compelling as ever.', "It's the brief breath of air that keeps the audience invested in the fates of the soldiers on screen, building up their characters by showing who they are when they aren't fighting for their lives.", "I'm so happy to be writing these words: The Clone Wars is back baby, and it's good! But don't you think for a second that I didn't notice Anakin's longer hair, which is both beautiful and worrisome...", 'While I\'m not particularly sold on the Bad Batch being "truly" bad, or even all that complicated, they do provide an off-kilter dynamic that may lead to some interesting developments down the line.', "Only time will tell if this arc has enough meat to justify the four-episode structure, but it's off to a promising start.", '[The premiere] effectively reintroduces this narrative and demonstrates some of the reasons why fans find The Clone Wars so much fun in the first place.', "If you're already a fan of The Clone Wars, this initial return suggests a finale that fulfills the promise of everything that's come before. It's beautiful, action-packed, and rich in themes and emotion."]

title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
plot: After the Republic's victory on Christophsis, Anakin and his new apprentice Ahsoka Tano must rescue the kidnapped son of Jabba the Hutt. Political intrigue complicates their mission.
genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
writer: Henry Gilroy, Steven Melching, Scott Murphy
actors: Matt Lanter, Ashley Eckstein, James Arnold Taylor, Dee Bradley Baker
Review_audience:
["The final arc of episodes is like one big animated star wars feature and is some of the most compelling Star Wars storytelling to ever exist, completely riveting and perfectly ties into Revenge of the Sith. The episodes before are good but not stand outs, that is the only reason this season doesn't get full marks but dam they truly ended this series on a huge high note.", 'Probably one of the best seasons in this series It certainly seems to have greatly improved in quality in the later seasons', 'Everything that Dave Filoni touches and have Sam Witwer and George Lucas inputs, story wise is a master piece. Simply an amazing season!! The perfect finale for a perfect show!', 'Best ending that it could  have.', 'The Clone Wars ends in a fantastic final season !', 'One of the best Star Wars content', "Early episode feel like a commercial for the Gi Joe (bad batch) toys. Time and time again druids will hold fire for no reason at all breaking the realism. Not to mention bad batch are all Gary Stu's with no limits. After that two cringy sister are introduced doesn't feel like cone wars until last episode were I imagine Disney mandates stopped.", "Clone Wars' final four episodes is the\xa0best Star Wars I've seen in a long time. Season 7 was mostly focused on the final tale, which was well worth resurrecting the series for, and which ranks among the greatest of the series.", "Star Wars: The Clone Wars's final season delivers absolutely nothing until the final four episodes, which, by then, is too late to save it.", "Good ending you really figure out wich were the original parts of the script and wich were Disney modifications. *Coughs* the  Martez'es

Would have given more stats but know that över havlf the season was scraped by Disney beacuse of lazyness is a damm pitty and left many arcs unfinished.. .", 'Never thought I would watch this show but it exceeded expectations immensely.', 'not giving all seasons a rating no', 'aside from the martinez arc this is star wars at its best', 'The final season of the clone wars is so awesome. All the seasons have good chemistry between charicters. This season gave me everything I wanted and redemed the show beyond what I thought', 'By far the best season of Star Wars the Clone Wars. Dave Filoni did a great job at wrapping up an amazing show. The final episodes successfully tied in the clone wars with the prequel films and cleared up questions that fans have had for many years. The animation upgrades were impressive and the fight scenes were portrayed flawlessly.', 'Me parece que este es el final ideal para esta serie. Combinando de muy buena manera esa aura triste del Episodio 3 con una atmosfera todavía alegre. Como si quisieras que esta temporada nunca acabara. Las escenas de acción son posiblemente las mejores de las series. Ya mucho mas pulidas, más dinámicas y con una mejora en la calidad notable. El Desarrollo de todos los personajes se cierra y no deja cabos sueltos. Si puede que algún episodio sea más una excusa para tapar algún hueco argumental de las películas, pero se agradece que hasta en esos pequeños detalles se esforzaran para darle un cierre digno a la serie. Una de las mejores temporadas, llena de acción y con esa magia de Star Wars que sigue igual de fresca que en aquel 1977.', 'Dave Filoni truly loves and understands Star Wars and made the best imperfect character in Ahsoka from being the most annoying and hated character to one of my favorite because she was humbled and became a humanized, relatable character. And also Rex, Maul, Clone Force 99, and everyone else is great too', 'A grand show with great stories that do lots of worldbuilding, as well as superb character development and chemistry.', 'Hands down the BEST Star Wars tale next to the movies and I will go a step further and say it surpasses most of the movies as well. The first half of the season is just ok but the later half is incredible!', "The perfect season finale in Television history! Star Wars the Clone Wars Season 7 deserves everything we can give it. Also, this season feels like Redemption for Star Wars' Reputation. Couldn't ask for anything better!!!", 'Season 7 is pretty great let me just start off by saying the last arc is literally the second best or the best arc in the show. The bad batch is pretty good but the one with ashoka and those girls is so bad. 
Last arc carries this season HARD', 'With heartbreaking moments, along with great action, impeccable and emotional storytelling. It makes this show have the perfect ending that it deserves.', 'As a whole, The Clone Wars is one of the most enjoyable TV shows you can find, it gets better every season and the characters are great.', "clone wars is my personal favorite star wars content. this season had its slow moments, i admit, but in hindsight only the good aspects are still present in my mind. the lengths i'd go to to be able to see this for the first time again…", 'Absolutely brilliant was to end the series.', 'I appreciate the fact that Disney made the effort to give this beloved show a proper ending Ahsoka vs Maul is one of the best lightsaber battles in star wars however they really missed the mark by not making the unfinished episodes from season 6 would have been much better than the martez sisters such wasted potential', 'The only bad thing about this season are the middle episodes with the twins. Otherwise it is literal perfection.', "Everything about the Clone Wars is masterful, and season 7 is the epitome of Filoni's work. It is beautiful and emotional, and it's the conclusion to this series that we didn't even know we needed. Absolute triumph.", 'The Siege of Mandalore was nothing short of a masterpiece. The best Star Wars content in 40 years.', 'I watched a good amount of the first 2 seasons of "Star Wars: The Clone Wars" as a kid on Cartoon Network. I never watched the series all the way through, so when Disney+ took on the final season of the series, I decided to undertake this journey. This is a show with many great story arcs and world-building moments and supplements both Episodes II and III well. I think for the most part it is easy to watch and keeps my interest. The series suffers from having at least one bad story arc in every season, which keeps it from true greatness. I think there are plenty of good and even great episodes scattered throughout the series, but the bad ones can make it a chore to watch at times if you decide to watch the entire series like myself. Overall, it is a solid addition to the "Star Wars" universe and one that fans will find plenty of enjoyment in despite some flawed story arcs.', 'The perfect finale for a legendary series.', "I have enjoyed The Clone Wars throughout its run, but Season Seven just manages to pull on the heart strings in a way that I never thought an animated show ever could.  We are gently eased into the season with a look at the Bad Batch (another show in the Star Wars saga well worth a watch), followed by a catchup with Ahsoka following her departure from the Jedi and then an amazing, motion-picture worth four episode arc that follows the events of Order 66 from Ahsoka and Rex's point of view.  Although technically a kids show, I feel that Season Seven has grown up with the fans that started with the show in 2008, culminating in some of the best story writing across the whole Star Wars saga.", 'Wonderful show overall. Very powerful ending, but very weak middle arc.', 'You cannot judge full season only because of amazing final. Martez episodes are wasted potential to show something more interesting.', 'O encerramento perfeito para a melhor série de Star Wars. O cerco de Mandalore é o melhor arco da franquia e eu me encontrei torcendo o tempo inteiro para de algum jeito Ahsoka impedir a Ordem 66. A luta dela com Maul é a melhor das animações e os gráficos e cenas tem a qualidade de um filme. Maul está poderosíssimo e a cena dele no corredor é de tirar o fôlego. Torço que Vossa Santidade Dave Filoni lance os 40 episódios cancelados de The Clone Wars posteriormente.', 'Totally fantastic has more life and depth than the Disney trilogy.', 'A spectacular ending to a spectacular show', 'Incredible storytelling and beautiful animation', "This would be 5 stars but I had to sit through those AWFUL episodes with the Hispanic sisters (I'm hispanic), telling their truth... But the Bad Batch ones and the Darth Maul ones... CHEF'S KISS!!!! NEVER HAVE I LOVED PADAWAN TANO so much!!!! That's how you write strong female characters. WHO SHOW and not TELL you why they are bad a*s.", 'Episodes 5-8 were awful. Pumped when they were finally over. And Wrecker in the bad batch is so annoying and idiotic that he completely ruins the other great aspects of the squad for me. Other than that this season was sick! The final 4 episodes were absolutely incredible.', 'Blending beautifully animated battle sequences with heartbreaking drama. The final season of Clone Wars concludes the popular series on highly satisfying and poignant note', "Dave Filoni has come back at it again, and revived Clone Wars! I finally finished watching Season 7 (the FINAL season) and the last 4 episodes were the BEST of the FINAL SEASON. The only arc that was boring was the Martez Sister Arc, which made me fall asleep for the 4 episodes. I didn't have a problem seeing Ahsoka Tano again (thank you Dave Filoni reminding us she's alive in Clone Wars and well), but the arc wasn't a great arc.

The final 4 episodes of ''Siege of Mandalore'' was OUTSTANDING either way. The music, the characters (Bad Batch was AMAZING), and the cinematography was OUTSTANDING. 

Thank you Dave Filoni for finishing off Clone Wars the RIGHT WAY with this season.", "The Bad Batch arc was basic, the Martinez or whatever sisters were annoying and infuriating, and the last arc couldn't make up for it IMO.", "Season 7 offers some of the best Star Wars television ever put to the small screen. It completes the stories of our clone trooper favorites, and ties in to Revenge of the Sith perfectly. I was a little thrown off by how it doesn't show the conclusion of Anakin/Obi-wan's story, or what happens to the jedi order. Instead it focuses on the events of Order 66 from Ahsoka's perspective. Looking back now I realize it wouldn't have made sense to show the fall of Windu, the Jedi order, Anakin/Obi-wan's friendship- because we've already seen all these events. We know these events are happening off screen but it keeps the conclusion of this story smaller scale, and more emotional. Seeing the failure of the Jedi, the fall of Anakin after his loss of Ahsoka, and the brainwashing of the Clones is genuinely moving, adding more layers of storytelling and emotional stakes underneath Episode 3.", 'Season 7, the final season of Star Wars: The Clone Wars is the perfect ending to this show, the last four episodes of the show is some of the best Star Wars out there. The animation is better than ever, the show looks more cinematic than ever before and the story is amazing. The first four episodes are amazing, the next four are honestly really bad but the saving grace of this season is easily the last four episodes. Well done Dave Filoni, you knocked it out of the park with this show!', 'Only down fall was the 3 episodes in the middle felt detached from the main story line.  The core story was well put together and tide in with the movies.', "Truth be told, I hated the first arc introduced, but I loved the last one. It's a deeper look into the tragic events shown in RoTS (2005). The animation is beautiful, but for the most part S7 is just too boring to hold up completely.", 'Masterpice, sad and bautifull like a poem...', 'love every minutes of it! I grew up with the Clone Wars, and this Season 7 completed my childhood :)', 'This. This is what Star Wars is at its best.', "Excellent conclusion to the world-within-a-world built over the past seasons by Filoni. Every Star Wars fan deserves to experience the masterclass in character development Filoni has carefully executed that raises the stakes of Anakin and Obi-Wan's journey. Filoni is a genius.

Separately, Ahsoka Tano could live on as one of the most beloved protagonists in this universe. The depth and arc of her character trajectory is incredible considering her portrayal has been limited to an animated medium. Not only does she provide meaningful representation for the female Star Wars fans, her flawed yet principled and compassionate nature are characteristics that fans of every stripes can admire and stand behind. Looking forward to seeing more of her in future Star Wars properties.", 'The final four episodes were amongst the best in the entire series, debatably the very best. Really makes you wish there were more seasons coming. The ending was as fulfilling as anyone could have hoped for, and it closed off a great series with a perfect blend of action, suspense, and emotion. Dave Filoni should continue to play a big role in the future of Star Wars.', "Execute Order S7. This final season not only finishes of the great Clone Wars series in an amazing finale, but also manages to tie the series into the Revenge of the Sith, the second best movie for a lot of people, including me. I haven't watched it yet, but I hope to and wish others will as well.", 'Yes. The series got better with each season, and the jumps in quality between the final few seasons were substantial. Ties in elegantly with the final movie of the prequel trilogy. I salute Dave Filoni.', "It was very good I wouldve given it 5 stars if it wasn't for the arc with the sisters that was bad. The bad batch arc was good but it was just normal clone wars to me but those last 4 episodes are the best episodes of the clone wars as a whole they were 11/10 episodes", 'Phenomenal score, heart wrenching story, a captivating final chapter in the Clone Wars series. One of the best stories told in a long time.', "Best star wars i've seen in a LOONG time", 'The first arc is pretty good and the second is alright. But the final four episodes of this series is some of the best Star Wars content I have ever seen and they EASILY make up for the flaws of the first two arcs.', 'I love this show and this is one of the best seasons!', 'Asi como alguien que quiere empezar a ver star wars tiene que ver las primeras 6 peliculas, tambien tendra que ver esta serie, es absolutamente fantastica, fue mejorando su calidad en todo sentido con el pasar de los años, la temporada 7 tiene un cierre magnifico, son muy buenas noticias que despues del fiasco que fueron las 3 peliculas de la secuela, hayan levantado el nivel con el final de esta serie y la serie de The Mandalorian, ojala que sigan por este camino por mucho tiempo.', 'The Clone Wars Season 7 is not only the best Season of Clone Wars, It has some of the best Star Wars of all time. The animation is incredible, The storytelling is Fantastic especially in the last glorious episodes. It is the perfect ending.', "Though the first eight episodes of this season aren't great, the final four episodes of the series give us everything we could ever want as fans. The Siege of Mandalore (Episodes 9-12) are the best Star Wars since The Empire Strikes Back and deserve the same recognition given to Episodes IV, V, Rogue One and The Mandalorian.", "This season is not perfect, due to one arc which is less than great. However, this season's final arc is the series' best, and some of the best Star Wars content ever made.", 'Even with the average "Bad Batch" episodes alongside the completely uncompelling Martez-Sister's episodes, the Siege of Mandalore episodes both close out the 12-year series in a phenomenally satisfying way and brought new interest into Star Wars even after Disney's many mistakes with the franchise.', 'Excelente término para esta serie, así se realiza una serie animada y un ejemplo de buen guión que algunas veces ni series de renombre poseen. Asoka como plato fuerte en esta serie es lo mejor de todo.', 'While previous seasons of Clone Wars had to cater for a very wide audience, writers and directors could abandon some of the usual commercial caveats in the last season and just tell a good story. And they did.', "This is an absolutely outstanding season, especially the final four episodes which are truly as great as any of the best Star Wars films. This season is packed with fun filled action, an amazing story line and an emotional and sentimental ending especially if you've been watching the show since the beginning. This is great Star Wars quality and will please any fan.", "Great ending to a great TV show but the Ashoka arc wasn't needed.", 'The last four episodes are the best Star Wars so far.', 'Im so so impressed with this', 'If I could, I would give this an 11/10. A captivating, heartbreaking, perfect finale to a show that played a great part of my childhood. This four episode finale is truly one of the best cinematic experiences that Star Wars has to offer. It may make your heart throb, but it is more than worth it, as simply put: this is Star Wars at its best.', 'Easily the best season. If only the whole season, or the whole show, had been as good as the last four episodes. The finale of the series was of cinematic quality.', "While the seasons third and final arc is some of the best Star Wars Content put out in the 21th century, the 7th season of Clone Wars starts out with a rather mediocre arc that never really exploitet it's full potential, followed by an arc that filled 4 episodes with a plot that needed 1, maybe two episodes, but it would already be stretching then and the plot still wouldn't be very good.", "Season 7's final 4 episodes is the best star wars movie in years and is on par and even better than some of the OG trilogy (ROTJ). It provides a more bitter than sweet conclusion to clone wars and will leave an impression on you long after you've watched it. But the season as a whole is not very solid. The final arc probably could have been released on it's own as a movie because these first eight episodes are pretty much a drag compared to the finale. The first arc is the Bad Batch which by all standard is an OK, arc 6.5/10 but its not really final season material(plus it's just setting up a spin off show so yeah). The second arc... is ironically some of the worst this show has to offer, while the story it's self isn't really that bad (more standard clone wars filler like the bad batch), the characters (specifically the 2 sisters) are so unlikable, cliche, annoying, and forgettable the only thing i can remember about them is that one is a bad pilot and the other is an idiot and i hate them both. It's also extremely disappointing since this is the first time we see Ashoka since season 5 and she comeback in this disappointing, drawn out, crap fest, that is barely entertaining and 100% SKIP ABLE LITERALLY YOU DON'T REALLY EVEN NEED TO WATCH IT FOR THE FINAL ARC OF THE SEASON. 2/10 the only thing i can say that is positive is a few of the jar jar episodes are worse, but just a few. In conclusion, what could have been the best star wars movie ever, is turned into a short season bogged down by filler and unnecessary garbage. I would have honestly given this 5/5 stars if those DUMB sister episodes didn't exist.", "Clone Wars was interesting. Apart from maybe 20 episodes in 7 seasons, all the rest is fun to watch. You learn a lot about the lore of Star Wars. It's a deeper look at the passage from the second movie to the order 66. Amazing work of animation, mix with character development. The rhythm of the episodes are frantic. I feel like the timeline and the movies are better justified with this series. I give it 82%. A must watch to know more about SW. Season 6 and 7 were the best.", 'the last 4 episodes are some of the best start wars anything i have seen.', 'No joke, the final season of the Clone Wars is one of the best entries in the Star Wars universe hands down- all thanks to brilliant characterization, awesome animation and  some truly jaw-dropping action sequences all making for the perfect conclusion to a fantastic series.', 'Amazing conclusion to an amazing series.', "This is the MOST heartbreaking season of any series I've ever seen. I cant stop crying when I get reminded of it... Its just so good and so sad!", 'One of the best seasons in the Clone Wars Series. With beautiful story telling, beautiful animation, with a breathtaking score, Season 7 leaves viewers satisfied while leaving them yearning for more.', "Even though there was a below average amount of episodes, they were above average in performance. The 4 episodes with the Martez sisters were some of the weakest episodes in a while, that out of the way, I can forgive those poor episodes because of the siege of Mandalore episodes (Last 4) were the best episodes of Star Wars the Clone Wars in the entire show. And the perfect conclusion to the show! Sorry G.O.T you've been beaten.", 'Clone Wars Season 7 was an amazing last season of this amazing show. The first arc about the Bad Batch were well done. While the next arc about Ahsoka and the sisters isn't as good but still adds some depth to Ahsoka. The final four episode arc "Siege of Mandalore" we see how Ahsoka and Rex dealt with Order 66 and serves as a perfect ending to the series.', "I've watched every show and movie, read every book and comic. EVERYTHING. and I have never come across a show that is as good as this one. It is by far as a kid the show that made me love star wars as much as I do. This last season is everything you could have ever wanted in a wrap up to this amazing godsend. Dave Filoni is the lord to all nerds I bow down to you.", "This is one of the best ways to end The Clone Wars, CGI is brilliant, from beginning to end of The Final Season it's crazy good.", 'One of the bests shows ever made.', 'After a throwaway clone-focused first arc, and a genuinely honest-but frustratingly slow-second one, the final arc alone is Clone Wars at its all-out peak, all with top-of-the-line animation, great direction, and an ultimately satisfying sense of scope!', 'The Bad Batch would deserve 4 or 3 1/2 stars. It was a fun welcome back but not final season material. The sisters arc was definitely not the best, 3 stars. But the siege of Mandalore is some of the best stuff ever PERIOD. Would give the siege of mandalore alone 66 stars out of 5.', 'The best "Star Wars" stories since many years! The final four episodes are really fantastic!! The proper remedy after the disaster of movie Part 8 and the ludicrous ending of Part 9.
So, it is now proven: "Star Wars" can easily have female protagonists to lead, when the story is good and relevant to all that has already happened to the "Star Wars's" universe and the character is fully developed. Every misstep of movies 7-9 has been avoided.
I was happy to reconnect with the franchise, hopeful that there will be a season 8 or at least a continuance of "Rebels".', 'Valió la pena la espera, con una animación mejorada y envidiable la temporada final hizo justicia a tan querida serie, con un final agridulce y un último capítulo bastante emotivo que incluso despierta nostalgia al devolvernos a la primera que vez que vimos la Venganza de los Sith. Bien logrado!! 👏', 'A brilliant last season for a beloved season. 

Season 7 gives us some of the most beautifully animated and heart wrenching scenes of the series, with a lot of fan-serving moments and a clear love for the franchise from its producers.', 'the sister arc is not really good the ending is great the animation awsome', 'I did not like this show when it have started many years ago. I hated Ahsoka Tano but as I watched the episodes and seasons I became a fan. The last 4 epsiode of this season is really extraordinary. This is absolut a different level what have seen from SW saga since the Disney had take over the LF.  I have to say Dave Filoni is genius at telling stories. And this is the most important. It dosent matter to have visually great a show or a movie (even a sci-fi) if the quality of the characters and depth of the story is lacking. He built up the best character (Ahsoka) in SW universe and bring back the hope that the Disney is able to produce decent quality of SW story.', "This is the caliber of Star Wars we've all been waiting for. I watched the first six seasons as a kid and was very disappointed when I found out that the series would be abruptly cut off because Disney bought Lucasfilm. Thankfully, Disney listened the the strong fan base and created this seventh season. 

Personally, I did not think that the first part of the episodes was very good. It was filled with the same corny Star Wars that was seen in the most recent trilogy. BUT, the last four episodes are absolutely spectacular. They weave perfectly into the cannon of Episode II and III without disrupting anything distastefully. I'm not usually one who is attracted to animation, but it was so well done that I caught myself admiring the work. This paired with an incredible score with a refreshed tone mimicking some of the themes in Episode III creates a deeply emotional experience (if you're a Star Wars junkie). 

Overall, the last four episodes are what make this season truly special. The other episodes set up the four part movie to be something truly awesome. I could not have asked for anything more. This is the Star Wars we have been waiting for.", 'I would give it 5 star because of the final 4 but the Bad Batch was ok and the Trace and Rafa episodes were frickin garbage', 'The depth of the characters is amazing. Slow in parts but that adds gravitas to the final episodes. Well played', "This is an absolutely incredible season. There are 3 story arcs in this season. The first one is about the Bad Batch, a group of clones that gained certain special abilities do to a genetic difference in their DNA. This arc is pretty good. The second arc is about Ahsoka and the Martez sisters. They get in some mishaps, and it goes into depth about how some people really feel about the Jedi. This arc is decent. The final arc is about the Siege of Mandalore and Order 66. My god, this arc is absolutely fantastic. It brings about so many emotions throughout it. It makes you feel happy, sad, nostalgic, amused, and depressed. The music used in the arc is absolutely fantastic, and is some of Kevin Kiner's best work. It ties in perfectly with the events of Revenge of the Sith, and by the end, it leaves you feeling depressed. The entire arc truly feels like a movie split into 4 parts. The Siege of Mandalore arc is what The Rise of Skywalker should've been: epic, full of passion, and emotional. I can talk about how good the arc is for days, rambling on and on. 
In conclusion, this is the REAL finale to content in the Skywalker Saga. I highly recommend watching this over any sequel content.", 'Some part of the season fills way too much information, but in the end this is show truly represents what star wars is all about, faith.', 'The best season of the show.', "This entire season was a masterpiece and Dave Filoni should be proud of it all. The ending was not as climactic as I wanted it to be but didn't leave much in the realm of loose ends.", "It was not that good, only the bad batch arc is worth watching. We all know how bad the sister arc was so I'll skip that. The last four episodes however were a huge disappointment to me. First off Ashoka acted like a little kid for awhile complaining how the Jedi won't give her troops even though she isn't a Jedi anymore and the Republic is under attack. I feel like the last 2 episodes could've been pushed together and that we can have an episode seeing how Rex and Ashoka deal with things after order 66. Also why is it that only Rex shows emotion, it's a very sad time and he is the only one who cares. It makes no sense that Ashoka wouldn't kill the clones at first because she doesn't even know that they aren't in control, hell even Rex is ready to shoot his own brothers but Ashoka tells him no. If Rex is okay with it then Ashoka should to. Spoiler Alert but I really loved how they made the storm troopers look as well as Darth Vader. Awesome, everything else was not that good though."]
Review_critics: ['The last three episodes are absolutely perfect, and show who were the true stars of this show. Magnificent ending. [Full review in Spanish]', "These last four episodes of Clone Wars is the best Star Wars movie I've seen in a while.", 'Season 7 was really all about the final story, and it was more than worth reviving the series for, and stands alongside the very best from the series and its sequel.', "While I will exhaust hours arguing Sequel Trilogy defenders, I'm sure all Star Wars fans will agree the Clone Wars finale is some of the best the entire saga has to offer.", "Some of the best Star Wars I've seen in years.", 'A mix of the excellent and the bloated; some the best stuff that Filoni has done for the series. [Full review in Spanish]', 'Sombre, thrilling and brilliantly done, The Final Season is a fine end to one of the best things about Star Wars.', "Every prequel should however, in the end, make the larger story better, and while Lucas' actual prequel trilogy struggled to do that, The Clone Wars pulled it off.", 'In the endgame, the show is better than ever.', 'This season will also serve as a gauge to see whether audiences want more of the STAR WARS saga told in animated form. If it comes even close to the quality of The Clone Wars, the answer will undoubtedly be yes.', 'The action sequences are dynamic, fluid, and the camerawork moves with a coolness and verve.', "'The Bad Batch' was a very welcome return for The Clone Wars.
